name: Kathará
description:
Kathará is a game about a delightful little demon who's trying to escape hell with nothing but a butterfly net! She was sent there because she spent her life abusing insects and Tithonus, the Greek god of bugs, cursed her and damned her to Hades. Now she must jump up the tartarus and fight her way through droves of disastrous monsters to get home.

Rules:

1.  Click to start the game.

2. Hold the mouse button to charge. 

3. Charge on the wall to earn more points, but you will slide faster.

4. Hold the up button in the air to charge a homing projectile, that will kill enemies.

5. Press the mouse button on the wall to walljump, press it in the air to perform a dive that will kill enemies.

Credits:

Game Designer: Dorillion Payne

Programmer: Jelani Stowers

Sound Designer: James Ryan

Artist: Jelani Stowers
